alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 11:07AM AKST until January 13 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, freezing rain and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds and ice accumulation could cause damage to power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
